doc.field: Records of New Perspectives on Caribbean Studies: Toward the 21st Century and Prospects for Caribbean Basin Integration(Conference held at Hunter College, CUNY, August 28-September 1, 1984)
Records of New Perspectives on Caribbean Studies: Toward the 21st Century and Prospects for Caribbean Basin Integration(Conference held at Hunter College, CUNY, August 28-September 1, 1984)
Series VII. Clippings, January 1982 - October 1984, undated
Series VII. Clippings, January 1982 - October 1984, undated

.5 linear feet (1 box), arranged chronologically. This series, which consists of clippings from U.S. and Caribbean papers, has been organized as three subseries. Subseries a. relates to grant funding, Subseries b. contains articles on a wide range of international topics, and Subseries c. consists of post-conference articles. Oversized clippings have been transferred to Series XV. Oversized materials.
